item.title: Replace unity with gnome3 and gnome-shell in ubuntu 11.04
item.description: Well I gave unity the old college try in ubuntu 11.04. But last night I just couldn’t take it any more. There were some small rendering issues occasionally plus some tray programs like workrave had no place to go, at least that I could find anyway and I really need workrave to remind me to change from sitting to standing positions every so often. At any rate I decided to try gnome3 and gnome-shell.
